en.title: {{Java}} Developer
en.text: Industrial IoT project for supervision and maintenance of connected equipment. Development of [[robust microservices]] for IoT data collection and processing.

es.title: Desarrollador {{Java}}
es.text: Proyecto IoT industrial para supervisión y mantenimiento de equipos conectados. Desarrollo de [[microservicios robustos]] para recopilación y procesamiento de datos IoT.

fr.title: Développeur {{Java}}
fr.text: Projet IoT industriel pour la supervision et la maintenance d'équipements connectés. Développement de [[microservices robustes]] pour la collecte et le traitement des données IoT.

ko.title: {{Java}} 개발자
ko.text: 연결된 장비의 감독 및 유지보수를 위한 산업용 IoT 프로젝트. IoT 데이터 수집 및 처리를 위한 [[견고한 마이크로서비스]] 개발.

en.title: {{React}} Frontend Developer
en.text: Industrial web application project for Airbus. Development of [[dynamic and responsive React components]] for production monitoring tools. Full React stack implementation with modern frontend architecture.

es.title: Desarrollador Frontend {{React}}
es.text: Proyecto de aplicación web industrial para Airbus. Desarrollo de [[componentes React dinámicos y responsive]] para herramientas de seguimiento de producción. Implementación full React con arquitectura frontend moderna.

fr.title: Développeur Frontend {{React}}
fr.text: Projet d'application web industrielle pour Airbus. Développement de [[composants React dynamiques et responsive]] pour des outils de suivi de production. Implémentation full React avec architecture frontend moderne.

ko.title: {{React}} 프론트엔드 개발자
ko.text: Airbus를 위한 산업용 웹 애플리케이션 프로젝트. 생산 모니터링 도구를 위한 [[동적이고 반응형 React 컴포넌트]] 개발. 현대적인 프론트엔드 아키텍처로 Full React 스택 구현.

en.title: {{Full-Stack}} Developer
en.text: Internal tracking application for administrative services. Frontend screen design and [[integration with backend APIs]].

es.title: Desarrollador {{Full-Stack}}
es.text: Aplicación de seguimiento interno para servicios administrativos. Diseño de pantallas frontend e [[integración con APIs backend]].

fr.title: Développeur {{Full-Stack}}
fr.text: Application de suivi interne pour les services administratifs. Conception d'écrans front et [[intégration avec les API back-end]].

ko.title: {{풀스택}} 개발자
ko.text: 관리 서비스를 위한 내부 추적 애플리케이션. 프론트엔드 화면 설계 및 [[백엔드 API와의 통합]].

en.title: {{Senior React}} Developer
en.text: Strategic project for improving HR and security management tools. [[Frontend integration and performance optimization]]. Critical component refactoring and technical support.

es.title: Desarrollador {{Senior React}}
es.text: Proyecto estratégico para mejorar herramientas de gestión RH y seguridad. [[Integración frontend y optimización del rendimiento]]. Refactorización de componentes críticos y soporte técnico.

fr.title: Développeur {{Senior React}}
fr.text: Projet stratégique d'amélioration des outils de gestion RH et de sécurité. [[Intégration front-end et optimisation de la performance]]. Refactorisation de composants critiques et support technique.

ko.title: {{시니어 React}} 개발자
ko.text: 인사 및 보안 관리 도구 개선을 위한 전략적 프로젝트. [[프론트엔드 통합 및 성능 최적화]]. 중요한 컴포넌트 리팩토링 및 기술 지원.

en.title: {{Senior React/Java}} Developer
en.text: Internal platform for staff and administrative document management. [[Technical leadership of a 6-person team]] with focus on:
list: Training junior developers
Code review and technical decision-making
Setting up common components to standardize interfaces
Reducing frontend technical debt

es.title: Desarrollador {{Senior React/Java}}
es.text: Plataforma interna de gestión de personal y documentos administrativos. [[Liderazgo técnico de un equipo de 6 personas]] con enfoque en:
list: Formación de desarrolladores junior
Revisión de código y toma de decisiones técnicas
Implementación de componentes comunes para estandarizar interfaces
Reducción de la deuda técnica frontend

fr.title: Développeur {{Senior React/Java}}
fr.text: Plateforme interne de gestion des effectifs et documents administratifs. [[Pilotage technique d'une équipe de 6 personnes]] avec focus sur :
list: Formation des développeurs juniors
Revue de code et pilotage technique
Mise en place de composants communs pour uniformiser les interfaces
Réduction de la dette technique front-end

ko.title: {{시니어 React/Java}} 개발자
ko.text: 직원 및 행정 문서 관리를 위한 내부 플랫폼. 다음에 중점을 둔 [[6명 팀의 기술 리더십]]:
list: 주니어 개발자 교육
코드 리뷰 및 기술적 의사결정
인터페이스 표준화를 위한 공통 컴포넌트 설정
프론트엔드 기술 부채 감소

en.title: {{CTO}} / Automation & AI
en.text: Startup specialized in short-term rental management. [[Complete automation of inter-service workflows]] with focus on:
list: Workflow automation (cleaning, scheduling, customer support)
Development of a property inspection web/mobile app
AI tools integration (OpenAI, Vercel AI SDK)
Internal training on no-code tools and prompt engineering
Technical stack management (infra, security, monitoring)

es.title: {{CTO}} / Automatización & IA
es.text: Startup especializada en gestión de alquileres de corta duración. [[Automatización completa de flujos de trabajo interservicios]] con enfoque en:
list: Automatización de flujos (limpieza, planificación, soporte cliente)
Desarrollo de app web/móvil de inspección de propiedades
Integración de herramientas IA (OpenAI, Vercel AI SDK)
Formación interna en herramientas no-code y prompt engineering
Gestión de stack técnico (infra, seguridad, monitoreo)

fr.title: {{CTO}} / Automatisation & IA
fr.text: Startup spécialisée dans la gestion locative courte durée. [[Automatisation complète des workflows inter-services]] avec focus sur :
list: Automatisation des workflows (nettoyage, ordonnancement, support client)
Développement d'une application web/mobile d'état des lieux
Intégration d'outils IA (OpenAI, Vercel AI SDK)
Formation interne sur les outils no-code et le prompt engineering
Gestion technique de la stack globale (infra, sécurité, monitoring)

ko.title: {{CTO}} / 자동화 & AI
ko.text: 단기 임대 관리 전문 스타트업. 다음에 중점을 둔 [[서비스 간 워크플로우의 완전한 자동화]]:
list: 워크플로우 자동화 (청소, 일정 관리, 고객 지원)
부동산 점검 웹/모바일 앱 개발
AI 도구 통합 (OpenAI, Vercel AI SDK)
노코드 도구 및 프롬프트 엔지니어링에 대한 내부 교육
기술 스택 관리 (인프라, 보안, 모니터링)
